bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates May 2007 as National Autoimmune Diseases Awareness Month.
Expresses support for: (1) efforts to increase awareness of the causes of, and treatments for, autoimmune diseases; and (2) increasing federal funding for research to learn the root causes of, and the best diagnostic methods and treatments for, such diseases.
